boardgame.name: Tiranos de Umbreterna
Tyrannen des Unterreichs
Tyrants of the Underdark
boardgame.description: Tyrants of the Underdark is a territory control game with a deck-building element._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player leads a house of Drow in a section of the Underdark below the Sword Coast. The Drow house is represented by a deck of cards, with each card being a minion in that player's deck. Each minion belongs to one of five aspects of Drow society, and those aspects correspond to different strategies in the game, e.g., malice minions excel at assassinating opponents' troops, while ambition minions are best at recruiting additional minions and promoting minions to your _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;inner circle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, which is a special zone that increases their value at the end of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When you set up the game, you create an 80-card deck by shuffling two 40-card half-decks together, with the half-decks being Drow, Dragons, Demons, and Elementals._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A central marketplace has new minions that can be recruited through influence, one of two resources in the game; purchased cards are placed in your discard pile, then shuffled together with other cards in your deck when needed. The other resource is power, which allows you to place troops on the game board, expand your forces across the map of the Underdark, manipulate happenings in the city, and assassinate enemy troops._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players gain points by controlling sites, recruiting valuable minions, promoting minions to your inner circle, and assassinating troops, and whoever ends the game with the most points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

We only sell new, unopened items. Visit our store at www.redeyedrabbit.be and check all our games and promotions. Online payment available with Visa, Ideal, Bancontact, ... in our webstore. Payment options through the Geek Market : - Bank transfer within European Union - Cash on Pickup in Olen or Balen (Belgium) Shipping options (buyer pays for shipping) : Postal Services (shipped to your door, max 30kg per shipment): - Benelux, Germany : 5€ (free when ordering for over 75€) - France, UK: 10€ (free when ordering for over 100€) - Italy, Poland, Denmark, Austria: 15€ (under 5kg), contact us for larger/heavier orders - Spain, Ireland, Sweden,Portugal, Tsjechia, Greece, Finland : 19€ (under 5kg), contact us for larger/heavier orders - Other European countries : contact us - USA : 17€ (up to 2 kilos, +5€ per extra kilo) KIALA Shipping (pickup point, max 15kg per shipment): - Belgium _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Luxembourg : 4,5€ - The Netherlands : 7,5€ - France : 10€ - Spain : 14€

Note that the box insert has been removed and is not part of this offer. All cards of the base game have been sleeved with high quality Dragon Shield sleeves. ! This offer also includes the expansion decks _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Aberrations _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Undead_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; ! The game has been stored in a non-smoking environment. Both the base game and the expansion are in English. Shipping within German: 5,- €. Shipping within the EU: 15,- €. Payment via bank transfer only. ________________________________________________________________________________ Das Spiel wurde lediglich einmal gespielt und alle Komponenten befinden sich in hervorragendem Zustand; die meisten Karten sind tatsächlich noch unbenutzt. Bitte beachten: Die Plastikeinlage des Spiels wurde entfernt um mehr Platz zu schaffen und ist nicht Teil dieses Angebots. Sämtliche Karten des Grundspiels sind in hochwertige Dragon Shield Sleeves gehüllt. ! Dieses Angebot beinhaltet zusätzlich die Erweiterung _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Aberrations _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Undead_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; ! Das Spiel wurde in einem Nichtraucherhaushalt aufbewahrt. Sowohl das Grundspiel als auch die Erweiterung sind in Englischer Sprache. Versand in Deutschland: 5,- €. Versand innerhalb der EU: 15,- € Zahlung nur per Banktransfer.
Das Spiel ist brandneu von 2018 !!!
